items.tweet: Calling your rep is more important than ever, and www.phoneyourrep.com is making it easy! Get your rep's contact info INSTANTLY #progress
The best way to make your voice heard? Speak up!  @phoneyourrep makes it easy: get your reps' contact info straight into your address book!
Ready to speak out?  www.phoneyourrep.com lets you add your House Rep and Senators straight into your phone!  ACTIVISM STARTS AT HOME!
